[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@fizz/paramanifest](./paramanifest.md) &gt; [Theme](./paramanifest.theme.md)

## Theme interface

What quantities the line chart displays overall. Defaults to the theme of the single series ONLY in single series charts.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface Theme 
```

## Properties

<table><thead><tr><th>

Property


</th><th>

Modifiers


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

[aggregate?](./paramanifest.theme.aggregate.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The statistical aggregate measured by this series or chart, such as 'total' or 'estimated', if any.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[baseKind](./paramanifest.theme.basekind.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

"number" \| "dimensioned" \| "rate" \| "proportion"


</td><td>

What kind of base quantity this is: either a number of things (number), a quantity measured by a unit (dimensioned), a rate of change (rate), or a proportion of a whole (proportion).


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[baseQuantity](./paramanifest.theme.basequantity.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The base quantity measured by the series or chart, such as 'item price' or 'inflation rate'.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[entity?](./paramanifest.theme.entity.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The singular, definite entity the quantity measured by this series or chart belongs to, if any.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[items?](./paramanifest.theme.items.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The multiple, indefinite items the quantity measured by this series or chart belongs to, if any.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[locale?](./paramanifest.theme.locale.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The particular location that the quantity measured by this series or chart is limited to, if any.


</td></tr>
